inclusion.criterion: with untreated vestibular migraine variant as diagnosed by history
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Allergies to nortriptyline or topiramate and their analogs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Medication interactions that preclude use of nortriptyline or topiramate
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or trying to become pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of substance abuse within the preceding 6 months prior to screening
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Used an investigational drug or device in the 3 months prior to screening
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Using marijuana for medical or other uses
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent C diff infections and was treated with Vanco for an extended course of 6 weeks. Pt was also encouraged to take probiotics and bleach her home when she was discharged.
